DOC.brief_summary: To describe biocompatibility , postoperative result complication implantation Corneal Quatrix Evolutive ( Corneal , Croma , Austria ) intraocular lens , hydrophilic acrylic intraocular lens ( IOL ) 4-haptic design 360° sharp optic edge .
DOC.brief_title: A Prospective Observational Case Series Four-ring-haptic Acrylic One-piece IOL
DOC.detailed_description: In prospective case series Corneal Quatrix Evolutive IOL implant 14 eye nine patient senile cortico-nuclear cataract . A standardized surgical technique post-operative regimen apply . Six month postoperatively best correct visual acuity ( BCVA ) , refraction complication ( especially ) posterior capsule opacification ( PCO ) analyse .
DOC.criteria: Patients senile corticonuclear cataract without previous intraocular surgery Dilated pupil size < 6 mm longterm antiinflammatory treatment previous history intraocular surgery previous history corneal endothelial damage previous history ocular trauma traumatic cataract history uveitis diabetic retinopathy advance macular degeneration
